div.a: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1827 Bukhara, Uzbekistan (anc. Sogdiana), (159) 1821 Burial: 2nd cent. B.C. (M) Contents: 4 AR Demetrius I, Bactria: 1 tetradr. Sogdian imit. of Euthydemus I: 3 tetradr. Disposition: unknown Tychsen, Comment. Soc. Reg. Scient. GÃ¶ttingensis, Classis hist. et phil. 1823, pp. 3-16, illus. With the four coins listed above were acquired four AE of Kushan types, but it is not explicitly stated that they belonged to the same hd.
